```css
├── jade
│   ├── master_templates
│   │   └── main.jade
│   ├── partials
│   │   ├── footer.jade
│   │   └── navigation.jade
│   └── templates
│       ├── about.jade
│       ├── contact.jade
│       └── index.jade
└── sass
    └── main.sass
```

```css
doctype html
html
   head
       meta(charset="utf-8")
       title Page title
       link(rel="stylesheet", href="css/main.css", media="screen", title="no title", charset="utf-8")

   body
       include ../partials/navigation
       block content
       include ../partials/footer
```
